report.title: EU Pollinator Squares Summary Mappable
report.description: A summary of which squares have been surveyed. Can work with a map.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.location_id = l.id AND csf.survey_id in (#survey_ids#) AND ((csf.date_end >= CAST(date_part('year', now()) || '-01-01' as date)) AND (csf.date_start <= CAST(date_part('year', now()) || '-12-31' as date))) WHERE l.location_type_id in (#location_type_ids#) AND l.deleted = false AND #website_filter#

param.name: poly
param.description: Draw Polygon to limit data to.

param.name: location_type_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of Location IDs to limit report to.

param.name: survey_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of Survey IDs to limit report to.

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs to load

column.name: surveyed
column.sql: case when count(csf.id) > 0 then 'Yes' else 'No' end

column.name: fo
column.sql: case when count(csf.id) > 0 then 0.5 else 0.5 end

column.name: sc
column.sql: case when count(csf.id) > 0 then 'blue' else 'red' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case when count(csf.id) > 0 then 'blue' else 'red' end
